## hpr2311 :: Baofeng UV5R VHF/UHF Handset part 5

 In this episode I cover the rear and front panel features & controls of the Baofeng UV5R VHF / UHF Hand Held Transceiver

Lithium Ion Battery, Wikipedia
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithium-ion_battery
Oscillator, wikipedia
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_oscillator
Variable Frequency Oscillator (VFO), Wikipedia
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Variable-frequency_oscillator
GB2RS news service (EDINBURGH GM4DTH)
https://rsgb.org/main/gb2rs/
VHF, Wikipedia
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Very_high_frequency
UHF, Wikipedia
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ultra_high_frequency
1750Hz Tone Burst
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selective_calling#Tone_burst_or_single_tone
